sub init {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->{dataName} = 'operators';
  $self->{name} = 'operator';
  $self->{Name} = 'operator';
  $self->{namePattern} = qr/.+/;
  $self->{tokenType} = 'op';
}
public method Parser::Context::Operators::redefine (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in redefine: 12
sub redefine {
  my $self = shift; my $X = shift;
  return $self->SUPER::redefine($X,@_) if scalar(@_) > 0;
  $X = [$X] unless ref($X) eq 'ARRAY';
  my @data = ();
  foreach my $x (@{$X}) {
    my $oldClass = $self->get($x)->{oldClass};
    push(@data,$x => {class => $oldClass, oldClass => undef})
      if $oldClass;
  }
  $self->set(@data);
}
public method Parser::Context::Operators::undefine (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in undefine: 18
sub undefine {
  my $self = shift;
  my @data = ();
  foreach my $x (@_) {
    if ($self->{context}{operators}{$x}{type} eq 'unary') {
      push(@data,$x => {
    class => 'Parser::UOP::undefined',
    oldClass => $self->get($x)->{class},
      });
    } else {
      push(@data,$x => {
    class => 'Parser::BOP::undefined',
    oldClass => $self->get($x)->{class},
      });
    }
  }
  $self->set(@data);
}
